<cs> i must say i am per cent <e> <s> in favour of this bill there is a destiny that shapes our ends rough hew them as we may <e>

<cs> my lords it is with some trepidation that i rise to address your lordships for the first time but i am heartened by your lordships well known generosity of spirit and sympathy on these occasions which i hope may also be extended to me <e>

<cs> my lords i declare an interest in the matter <e> <s> i am a trustee of the research fund for complementary medicine which is a body that raises money for the research council for complementary medicine <e> <s> i congratulate my noble friend lord baldwin on initiating the debate and on the speech which launched it <e>
